name: Sketchy Runner
description:
Sketchy Runner is a 2D platformer that requires speed and precision to complete each level.

Play as Sketchy, a stickman who's come to life in a student's notebook. Now, Sketchy must protect his fellow creations from the cowardly Eraser, who seeks to erase everything!

Dive into each level with fast paced movement and offensive tools to take out enemies along the way.

  • Jump- Bounce on top of basic enemies to eliminate them.
  • Dash- Rush forward and eliminate enemies hit.
  • Slide- Allows for Sketchy to go under terrain, but has no offensive traits.

But don't take too much time!

 With Eraser on the loose, time is of the essence. Levels will have a set amount of time to complete. Pick up Collectables in each to increase your timer by 10 seconds.
